results.content:
The instructor speaks very clearly and it shows that he has experience in teaching this type of courses. At times it was a bit too fast so I had to rewind to repeat a few sections.
This course definitively is enlightening and I was glad to finally have found somebody that helps me make sense of all these technical Apache commands and abbreviations.
